text: A tremor shakes the Yawning Portal, and something massive begins to ascend from the well.
A monster emerges from the well in the Yawning Portal, and Sigfried attempts to attack it with a sewage-covered shovel.
Sigfried Pye stumbles, falls, and soils himself in the Yawning Portal, drawing disgusted reactions from patrons and a weary response from Durnan.
A large troll emerges from the well in the Yawning Portal, threatening the patrons.
Victor Saltzpyre threatens Kallisar with his sword, causing a tense moment in the tavern.
Victor Saltzpyre threatens Durnan with his sword, demanding he say a specific phrase.
Kallisar reveals a magic looking glass to Victor, showing him his own face and saying "I like boys", causing a stir in the tavern.
Sigfried Pye changes into clean overalls behind a tapestry while the troll rampages.
Victor Saltzpyre attempts to intimidate Durnan, but Durnan remains unfazed and issues a warning.
Victor Saltzpyre strikes down the troll with a decisive blow.
Victor attempts to collect payment from the Yawning Portal patrons for saving them from the troll.

Victor defeats a troll in the Yawning Portal and attempts to collect payment, but is unsuccessful. Kallisar reveals a magic looking glass, causing a stir. Victor threatens Kallisar. Hadrian approaches Victor.
Victor Saltzpyre checks his underwear for skid marks after defeating a troll.
Balthur is revealed as the main antagonist and teleports to a dark castle at the edge of the kingdom.
The party engages in extensive roleplaying and banter, primarily targeting Balthur with insults and jokes.
Victor attempts to intimidate a tavern patron, but Hadrian points out the patron is a strong-looking woman.
Sigfried Pye licks a corpse's elbow, prompting a strong reaction from Victor.
Victor speaks to an unseen entity behind the tapestry, provoking a growl and scurrying sounds.
Sigfried Pye states he is using his tongue to interact with the environment, causing discomfort among the party.
A tavern patron gouges out his own eyes in apparent disgust.
Sigfried Pye tunnels out of the bar into the Waterdeep sewage system using a shovel and his knowledge of sewage.
Kallisar levels up to level 6 after receiving a steak.
Kallisar casts a homebrew regrowth spell on Sigfried, restoring his shattered teeth, but causing them to overgrow into beaver teeth.
Sigfried Pye breaks through a wall into a new area.
Balthur rolls a d20, but the action has no immediate mechanical effect.
Victor is placed on Hadrian's head as a hat.
Victor Saltzpyre crouches up and down on Hadrian Goldhammer's head.
Sigfried Pye charges Victor Saltzpyre, knocking him prone and throwing Hadrian Goldhammer off his head.
Victor Saltzpyre throws a javelin at the orc, Toilet.
Victor Saltzpyre throws a javelin, hitting Sigfried Pye in the heel instead of the intended target, an orc.
Victor Saltzpyre decapitates the hippogriff with his sword.
Sigfried Pye attempts to persuade the party to spare his life by offering to 'eat bofa'.
Victor Saltzpyre scratches his nuts, prompting a reaction from Hadrian and indifference from Kallisar.
Victor Saltzpyre attempts to scratch Kallisar's nuts, prompting a negative reaction from Kallisar and amusement from Hadrian.
Victor Saltzpyre attempts to scratch Kallisar's nuts, leading to Kallisar's annoyance, Hadrian's amusement, and the triggering of a wet cough and growl from deeper in the passage.
Victor's inappropriate action alerts a creature in the passage.
Sigfried Pye's desperate offer to lick elbows alerts a creature in the passage.
Victor's inappropriate action alerts a creature in the passage.
